original_text: And as for the likeness of their faces, they were the same faces whose appearance I had seen by the Chebar canal. Each one of them went straight forward.
korean_text: 그 얼굴의 형상은 내가 그발 강 가에서 보던 얼굴이며 그 모양과 그 몸도 그러하며 각기 곧게 앞으로 가더라

sentences.original_text: And as for the likeness of their faces,
whose appearance I had seen by the Chebar canal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 얼굴들의 모습은 내가 그발 강가에서 보았던 것이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Each one of them went straight forward.
